pages.text: Ankylosaurus was a large, armored dinosaur from the Late Cretaceous Period. It had a thick, bony armor covering its body, and a long, spiked tail. Ankylosaurus was a herbivore, feeding on plants and leaves. It was one of the largest land animals of its time, and its armor provided protection from predators.
Imagine a walking tank with spikes - that's an Ankylosaurus! Nature really said 'make it chonky and add armor' with this absolute unit!
